alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 7:40PM CDT until May 25 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Lee, Hancock, Henderson and Des Moines Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Burlington. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 13.8 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued early Wednesday morning.
